InstructionData.Title: PREG - Pressure Regulator
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Atmospheric Reglator # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library alias GasSensor d0 alias Intake d1 alias Relief d2
define targetpres 101.325 define deadzone 1
alias device r0 alias maxtemp r1 alias maxpres r1 alias mintemp r2 alias minpres r2 alias temp r3 alias pressure r3 alias sp r4 alias activate r5 alias color r6
init: add maxpres targetpres deadzone sub minpres targetpres deadzone
loop: #s Intake On 0 #s Relief On 0
s Intake Lock 0 s Intake PressureExternal 0 s Intake PressureInternal minpres s Intake Mode 1 s Intake On 1 s Intake Lock 1 #s db Setting minpres #j exit s Relief Lock 0 s Relief PressureExternal maxpres s Relief PressureInternal 40000 s Relief Mode 1 s Relief On 0 s Relief Lock 1 #yield #j loop exit:
